title: [Placements] Apple is visiting campus
content:
Apple is visiting campus for placements and they are offering only internship.
Can the seniors please tell us if the internship is usually converted to full time employment?

comments.body:
Ig there will be no Full time,
I know a senior Vibha Masti she did internship in Apple but didn‚Äôt got the Full time 

But surprising thing is GPA cutoff is 7 crazy 
Usually it was above 9
I think some people who did the internships last year did get converted
That's cause she went to the US for her Masters, not because she didn't get FT
Around 30 people from our batch were selected for the internship and almost everyone got converted to full time too. But it could always be different for your batch
bro is it for students in rr or ec or both
Both
what is the required gpa for boys for apple this year ?
7 for everyone
but last year isnt that 9.x + gpa for boys for apple written in the placement sheet made by seniors?
Eligible GPA ‚â† Shortlisting GPA. Companies can set 7+ as minimum required to be eligible and then shortlist 9+.
It's final cutoff. Companies keep lesser gpa before writing OA and eventually increase the gpa if many students clear OA
When did the mail come??
ooh, got it thanks
so gpa is important ü•≤, coz even 8 pointer will be rejected even if they cleared oa during shortlisting
Yep. I am facing the same problem.

placements in PES is unified (all companies take from both campus and they dont know which campus you are from)  
also it was drought last week where they barely sent any company mails and they spammed 4-5 companies yest night-today morning

Btech+Mtech in 5 years itself. Offered by unis like bits and vit
Bits does not offer integrated mtech I believe.The offer MSc+Btech integrated programs for ex:MSC Phy+BE in subject that you get after first year depending on seat availability and cgpa.
From which sem are they gonna recruit and is it only for cs or ece also has scope?
It's been said a billion times here, placements are common for both the campuses.
Can we apply each time if they come multiple times or only once?
They only came for one role IS&T is this role worth it?
People ask questions but don't read the answers.

Apple intern here wishing everybody all the best ‚ù§Ô∏è
Brush up your DSA, keep your basics brushed up (OS specifically)

IS&T maintains a lot of the computing infra that Apple owns (data centers, networks etc.) so you'll definitely learn a lot about large enterprise scale systems (read as much documentation and stuff outside your work to learn more) 

Basically it's not just IT support
Is it possible for me to apply even if i have an offer from T1 company already? Cus its apple and it feels so wrong to miss out on a company like that üò≠
Do you like the work culture there?
Bro, what‚Äôs the bare minimum number of DSA LeetCode questions we should solve to be ready for cracking interviews?

This number changes based on how comfortable you are with a given concept (because you should be approaching Leetcode concept wise). How do you judge comfort? When you can see a related problem you've never encountered before and recognize the pattern behind it

In my opinion (don't take it seriously, and definitely don't spam my DMs with gaalis) it's the best among the FAANGs work culture wise, even though there's not a super high level of collaboration between different verticals
